Package org.kj.blackjack.gameio

Class CommandLineOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kj.blackjack.gameio.CommandLineOutput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OutputDevice

    public class CommandLineOutput
extends java.lang.Object
implements OutputDevice
    Prints outputs to command line. Does not read input at all.

      • promptForAction

        public void promptForAction​()
        Prompts the player to input 'h' or 's' to hit or stand (respectively). Tells user that input is not case-sensitive.
        Specified by:
        promptForAction in interface OutputDevice

      • displayResults

        public void displayResults​(java.lang.String p1,
                           java.lang.String p2,
                           GameResult result)
        Displays the game result. Prints which player won (or they tied) and why the result was what it was (opponent busted or had higher sum).
        Specified by:
        displayResults in interface OutputDevice
        Parameters:
        p1 - the name of Player 1
        p2 - the name of Player 2
        result - the result of the game

        Prints the name and hand.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the player who has the hand
        hand - the hand of cards to print

        Parameters:

        handSize - the number of cards the player has in their hand

      • splitTurn

        public void splitTurn​()
        Prints a blank line (used to separate chunks of printing, such as between the turns of the players)
        Specified by:
        splitTurn in interface OutputDevice

      • endOfGame

        public void endOfGame​()
        Prints a line of dashes. Used to denote the end of one game
        Specified by:
        endOfGame in interface OutputDevice

      • promptForPlayerType

        public void promptForPlayerType​()
        Prompts an input of 'hp' for humand player type and 'spb' for SafePlayBot. This does not read the input, only prints the prompt
        Specified by:
        promptForPlayerType in interface OutputDevice

      • promptForName

        public void promptForName​()
        Prompts for a name to be entered. This does not read the input, only prints the prompt.
        Specified by:
        promptForName in interface OutputDevice

      • promptNumGames

        public void promptNumGames​()
        Prompts for the number of games. This does not read the input, only prints the prompt.
        Specified by:
        promptNumGames in interface OutputDevice

      • displayStats

        public void displayStats​(int p1WinHigherSum,
                         int p1WinOppBust,
                         int p2WinHigherSum,
                         int p2WinOppBust,
                         int tieGameEqualSum,
                         int tieBothBust)
        Prints the game statistics. Shows the occurrence of each type of game result in GameResult.
        Specified by:
        displayStats in interface OutputDevice
        Parameters:
        p1WinHigherSum - the number of times Player 1 won due to a higher sum
        p1WinOppBust - the number of times Player 1 won due to opponent busting
        p2WinHigherSum - the number of times Player 2 won due to a higher sum
        p2WinOppBust - the number of times Player 2 won due to opponent busting
        tieGameEqualSum - the number of times the game was tied by both players having equal scores and not busting
        tieBothBust - the number of times the game was tied by both players busting
